thread.title: Mahershala Ali And His Wife Welcome Their First Child With An Adorable Photo
thread.title_full: Mahershala Ali And His Wife Welcome Their First Child With An Adorable Photo

author: Erin La Rosa
title: Mahershala Ali And His Wife Welcome Their First Child With An Adorable Photo
text:
View this image ›
Mark Ralston / AFP / Getty Images ID: 10596921 2. But it’s a big weekend in more ways than one, because he and his wife, Amatus, just welcomed a daughter named Bari. View this image ›
Frazer Harrison / Getty Images ID: 10596914 3. Mahershala uploaded a photo of his new baby girl getting cuddles and kisses from her mom on Friday with the caption, “Bari (Bar-ee) Najma Ali 2/22/17 #pisces”. Loading View on Instagram
Instagram: @mahershalaali ID: 10596889 4. What a sweet way to start off such an incredible weekend. View this image ›
mahershalaali / Via instagram.com ID: 10596907 5. Congrats to the beautiful couple, and fingers crossed for Sunday’s awards! Loading View on Instagram
Instagram: @mahershalaali ID: 10596950
